QuestData.Title: Candle of Command
QuestData.Description: You no come in yet! Give orders to other kobold on Throne of Ordering Around if you want in, then maybe we talk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sit upon the Throne of Ordering Around and give orders to kobolds that approach.
QuestData.CompletionText: What you lookin' at, stink head?
QuestData.RewardText: What you doing back so soon?

Objectives.Objective: Sit on the Throne of Ordering Around
